message: Let's start fair.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, since the money will be worth less to me in later rounds.
Your turn to be fair, Alice.  I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. This accounts for the faster devaluation of the money for you.
Let's split it down the middle.  We both lose value with each round, so a 50/50 split is the fairest option right now.
I understand the time pressure, Alice, but 50/50 is still not accounting for the rapid devaluation of your share. I'm proposing 58/42.
Let's try to meet in the middle.  I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not comfortable with a 58/42 split.
Alice, we're running out of time. This offer heavily favors me, but it's the only way to get a deal that makes sense for both of us given the rapid devaluation.
We're both losing value quickly. This offer is the closest I can get to a fair split while still ensuring we both get something.
